prHeadline: XCINEX Announces the Selection of Spotlight Cinema Networks as Exclusive Advertising Representative for its Premium Content Streaming Marketplace
headlineTxt: Jul 21, 2021, 09:00 ETXCINEX Announces the Selection of Spotlight Cinema Networks as Exclusive Advertising Representative for its Premium Content Streaming Marketplaceaims to reach audiences who are left out of in-person ticketed events due to location, capacity restrictions, and limited showtimes. Using AI and machine vision, VENUE's automated ticketing process is able to authenticate the number of people in the room and match that to the number of tickets to be purchased.More news about: CineLife Entertainment
